description:
archive/tar: accept binary format when reading numeric header fields.

Fixes issue 4358.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/6840043/diff/5001/src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go
File src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6840043/diff/5001/src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go#newcode75
src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go:75: // Check for binary format first.
On 2012/11/08 00:56:57, r wrote:
> who says this is the format?

It's the GNU extension, and what we produce in writer.go. The docs referenced in common.go describe this.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c8d869358e07 ***

archive/tar: accept binary format when reading numeric header fields.

Fixes issue 4358.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6840043

http://codereview.appspot.com/6840043/diff/5001/src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go
File src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6840043/diff/5001/src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go#newcode75
src/pkg/archive/tar/reader.go:75: // Check for binary format first.
who says this is the format?

subject: code review 6840043: archive/tar: accept binary format when reading numeric ...
